short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'internet of things' with 'wifi enabled toaster'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces the text 'Internet of Things' with 'Wifi Enabled Toaster'. Also replaces 'IoT' with 'WeT'.

Inspired by the Cloud to Butt extension. 

Thanks :^)
